type.name: T:Elysium.Converters.PercentToAngleConverter
type.summary: Converts a percent of the full angle in a value of the angle.

method.name: M:Elysium.Converters.PercentToAngleConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
method.summary: Converts a percent of the full angle in a value of the angle.
method.param: A percent of the full angle. Has to be one of the following types: , , , , , .
A target type. The value is ignored.
Converter's parameter. The value is ignored.
Language and local parameters used in converter. The value is ignored.
method.returns: A value of the angle is the same type that is. If there is a failure during method execution, following value will be returned DependencyProperty.UnsetValue.

method.name: M:Elysium.Converters.PercentToAngleConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
method.summary: Converts a value of the angle in percent of the full angle.
method.param: A value of the angle. Has to be one of the following types: , , , , , .
A target type. The value is ignored.
Converter's parameter. The value is ignored.
Language and local parameters used in converter. The value is ignored.
method.returns: A percent of the full angle is the same type that is. If there is a failure during method execution, following value will be returned DependencyProperty.UnsetValue.
